entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 2 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: E 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then clearing. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain in the morning. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
